comment_0: This is clearly a song written from cole's own experience. He really puts a lot of emotion in the song when he sings,  especially when he sings " i cry sometimes about"  Personaly, i love this song because it shows exactly how some men act when they end up in situations like this. cole admits to having acted in that way but his point of view changes and he realises that even if the child isnt his its his reponsability as a man to care for it "but what about your seed nigga?".
